attributes.action: Provide clear and true detail on leaving EU, then RERUN the EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for everyone to be given the chance to have an INFORMED vote on the future of our country. 

Brexit will have a huge impact on every person in every part of the UK. 

So much deceit, vitriol and racism shrouded both sides of EU Referendum, with people on both sides feeling misled by the campaigns; and since then being misrepresented by a prime minister whom none of the public voted for. 

In light of changes since the referendum, sign this petition for a Second Chance.
attributes.background:
This petition is for everyone, whether you voted to leave the EU, to remain, or if you didn't vote and wished you had.

We are calling on the Government to provide a clear AND HONEST manifesto of what the proposals are for the UK after Brexit, and a Second Referendum based on this information.
